website_summaries.verdict: The Polk Audio UltraFit 1000 will stay in place during intense workouts, but these earphones prioritize fit over audio performance.
pros: Flexible cable housing can be molded and shaped over the ear for a secure fit
Comes with two sizes of cable extensions, one with an inline mic and remote
cons: Distorts at top volumes on deep bass
Overall audio performance can be inconsistent from ear-to-ear due to flexible fit
Non-sealed in-ear fit lets outside sound inâ€”ideal for joggers, but not noisy gyms

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying these are great headphones and that is why I ordered again, lost ear rubber on previous one (few years old). So I test them at home when I received and for some reason the volume gets low all be itself, not sure why, thought I had not connected properly but this morning going to work it happened again, not sure if I need to return. I will try to use them again and if remains the same I would like to get them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: They stay in
customer_reviews.text: Pros: + They stay in + Wires don't make noise in the headphones + They don't fall out + Long cord has iPhone controls + They stay in + Should be pretty water resistant + Don't fall out. + various tips to make sure they fit correctly. - The long extension could have been a universal headphone iPhone control cord, but they used a specially shaped rubber protector (for water resistance I assume) that prevent other headphone jacks from fitting in. - The short cord doesn't have iPhone controls.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rose

customer_reviews.title: Really good wired headphones for running.
customer_reviews.text: So far the best wired headphones for running that I've tried. Occasionally, one side will work loose from my ear, but compared to the other earbuds I've tried, these are definitely the best. Like them a lot. And the three cord lengths give you lots of options. Although be aware that you need to use the medium or long length to have have volume controls and microphone on the cord. The shortest cord length doesn't have those on it.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for running. They lasted just about 6 months before the right ear headphone stopped working altogether. One cord is too long the other too short for an arm band, so you wind up wrapping and tucking the longer cord. The clip for the volume/mic control rarely holds in place for a full jog. The sound quality was good when they worked and the phone mic did work well. The fit wasn't very good, often they would fall out and I would have to adjust during my run. At this price I would try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Fair. Good fit, defective cable.
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to find a good fit and seal for running and these did provide that. However the longer cable was defective out of the box and right ear cut in and out so these had to go back immediately. Could easily be a 1 star due to that but the fact that otherwise it was a good fit and at least decent sound makes me give me them a 3.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great for what they are for.
customer_reviews.text: - Do not fall out running like other headphones - I can hear cars coming (run safe) - I can run with others, hold a conversation, and listen to music with these. - Do not fall out lifting or doing hanging workouts. Note- they are not going to sound like normal noise canceling headphones...because that is not what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very clean sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for running with my iPod. The cheaper pair just weren't cutting it. These sound great, stay put, and are comfortable. They are also an excellent value compared to Bose and other hyped up brands.
customer_reviews.author: SharePoint Blackbelt

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: They're light and felt like they were going to fall out the first time I jogged with them. They're better than earbuds but still not a perfect fit for me. Sound quality is good but not as good if the ear piece floats away from your ear as you run.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: The work
customer_reviews.text: These fit and stay in pretty well during exercise. This cannot be said for ANY of the other earbuds I have tried - even the Sony and other "sport" ones with various extra parts. They sound very good!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Van Hecke

customer_reviews.title: I love to run with these and they work great
customer_reviews.text: I love to run with these and they work great. good volume control and can still answer your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Binns Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones I've  had.
customer_reviews.text: Love these head phones. I have had so many other types and brands I can't even keep track before these that wouldn't stay in my ear or would break soon after I bought them. These stay in my ear no matter what. The sound is pretty good and they are very comfortable. They have already outlasted a few of the other brands i had previously bought.(Sony and skull candy) these are great for working out or any activities you might do.
customer_reviews.author: Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: not nearly so durable as they claim.
customer_reviews.text: -they are bass heavy, which can be good on some tunes but often drowns out/omits higher registers -they stay ON the ear well enough, but the phone-tub easily slips out of the ear canal while moving. -the cable attached to the phones is only a few inches long. it comes with two extending cables, but both broke within the 3 months since i've purchased. there are many better products at this price.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: I like this type of headphone because they stay in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it had a mic; I like this type of headphone because they stay in my ears when I run. However the mic is picking up my heart rate monitor (makes a subtle clicking sound).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound as good as any others for the price. The microphone is as good as any I've used - including more expensive headphones. I used them pretty much daily for about a year and a half - including workouts, stuffing them in a briefcase, etc. The connections in the audio control panel eventually broke, and the plastic part that goes over the ear had also started to crack. Still, I'm sure they would have lasted much longer had they not been mistreated.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Vornholt

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these for working out and they work perfectly. The hold snug to my ears and the different size cords make it nice to find the right length. The sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Iannazzo

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a runner who wants a relatively inexpensive pair of earphones, look no further. I've been using mine for about 3 weeks now with no issues. The sound is fine and they stay in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Berke Party of 6 ha...

customer_reviews.title: I have smaller ears and I'm having a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have smaller ears and I'm having a problem with them staying in my ears even with the thicker inserts
customer_reviews.author: C. webb

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to earbuds.  Best for runners.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I recommend these for runners. They stay in place and sound great!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and sound quality. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: prompt receipt and good sound, but the fit is less than optimal
customer_reviews.author: Chigaman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but still prone to cracks in the plastic
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kwolek

customer_reviews.title: Not enough depth to the sound
customer_reviews.text: I found that it lacked base and therefor all my music sounded flat. Besides that, the fit of the headphones is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One month after I purchased these headphones the left side blew out. They are not very comfortable in my ears, and start falling out when I sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Gmc

customer_reviews.title: So swesome
customer_reviews.text: BEST workout headphones EVER. They stay on all the time, no cord tangles and great sound. A win for the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 50 days of use, the left-side audio stopped working. I've noticed that other buyers posting here had the same problem. And to make matters worse, I can't return it for credit or replacement because it's been over the 30-day policy. This product isn't cheap and obviously there's a defective batch being sold. What's going on Polk and Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Tulio

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Sound ok. The ext cord with mic broke after one use. They do stay in though, so there's that. Maybe the 3000 is better
customer_reviews.author: Tim Moore

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they're fine
customer_reviews.text: They just didn't fit my ears, so I couldn't use them at all. Returned them immediately. And, no. I'm not an elf.
customer_reviews.author: the_dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little to much bass but I live the style and fit
customer_reviews.author: dianne schwind

product_meta.title: Polk Audio UltraFit 1000 Headphones - White (ULTRAFIT 1000WHT)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPolk Audio's new UltraFit Sports Headphone Series is a rethinking from the ground up of performance, comfort and durability - the three characteristics serious athletes need most in a pair of headphones. Serious music lovers too will value the UltraFit Series because of its undeniably impressive sonic performance. The UltraFit 1000 is similar in design to the UltraFit 500 but with the added feature of a 3 button in-line remote control and a microphone, both of which allow you to use your iPod or iPhone. Like the UltraFit 500, the 1000 is designed to sit in the flange of your ear canal and provide a moderate noise suppression. The UltraFit 1000 also comes with a short (14") hassle-free and tangle-free cable for MP3 sleeve and collar connections.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Designed from the ground-up to meet the rigorous needs of the athlete and perfect for any active listener, UltraFit Sports headphones will be the last headphone you'll ever need to buy.

The UltraFit 1000 is a high performance headphone designed to sit in the flange of your ear canal, while the ear piece hook insures a snug yet comfortable fit. A 3-button remote control and in-line microphone enable you to use your iPod® or iPhone® anytime, anywhere. The 1000 is designed to provide a moderate noise suppression so you can be aware of your environment.

Three Cable Lengths For hassle-free, tangle-free Convenience. The UltraFit™ 1000 comes with three cable length options, so you can wear your music device the way that works best for you. A long (41") cable enables you to wear your music player on your waist or pants pocket. The short (14") cable is perfect if you wear your player on your arm, while the headphone to 1st connector is ideal for collar-clipped players like the iPod Shuffle®. 

Key Features

 * High Performance Digital Sound—Surprising detail and fidelity to maximize performance.
 * 3-Button Remote Control & Microphone—Use your iPhone and iPod on the fly with in-line controls.
 * SecureFit™ Support—Exercise or play knowing your headphones will stay comfortably in place.
 * Environmental Awareness Engineered In—Hear enough of your surroundings to feel secure during exercise.
 * Ultra Flexible Tangled-Free Planar Audio Cables—Avoid cable tangle and unwanted microphonics with oxygen-free cables in two custom lengths.
 * StrainGuard™—Kevlar core and computer designed transitional connections eliminate cable failure.
 * Moisture Shield—Resists moisture and keeps performing through strenuous activity.
 * Short (14") Cable—For iPod nano®, iPod
 * 3.5 mm Connector—Designed to fit through the opening on all cases.
 * Engineered For Durability & Comfort—Made with the latest materials and performance technology to take punishment while staying comfortable.

Why you should consider this product

 Serious exercisers and serious music listeners alike, in fact anyone who leads an active lifestyle, will truly appreciate Polk Audio UltraFit headphones. These headphones deliver a richer, more natural sound that makes music more enjoyable or more motivating. We've paid particular attention to fit and comfort. If it wasn't for your music you may not know you're even wearing them. UltraFit headphones were specially designed to stand up to a professional athlete's demanding workouts, so you can count on them going the distance with you. Their durability is just one of the reasons the UltraFit Series will be the last headphone you ever need to buy. The UltraFit 1000 features a 3-button in-line remote control and a microphone, both of which allow you to use your iPod® or iPhone®. The 1000 is designed to sit in the flange of your ear canal and provide a moderate noise suppression. 

Take a look inside this product

 1. Dynamic Balance® Polymer Drivers. UltraFit Sport Headphones employ dynamic drivers much like those in our full size speakers. To meet our pre-determined performance parameters, our engineers took the same care designing the drivers, even adding a discrete crossover filter to each driver to naturalize the high frequencies.
 2. Ported Enclosures. UltraFit Sports Headphones are ported. There is the port (ear piece) you put in your ear. But the big deal is the very small channels in the back of the driver enclosure, beneath the Polk logo. These are crucial to tuning the driver's frequency response peaks. And that means a better sounding pair of headphones.
 3. Ultra Flexible Tangle-free Planar Audio Cable. Round cables, coiling up and twisting are a constant source of annoyance because they get in the way of your workout. Eventually constant twisting means the cable will break or pull out at the end. The UltraFit's planar design (with oxygen-free wire for better conductivity) completely eliminates coiling, so the headphone cables won't tangle up during a workout, or when stored away. The planar design also eliminates micro-phonics, the tendency of an electronic device to turn a mechanical vibration into "noise," which you hear in other headphones. 
 4. Moisture Shield. No headphone works well in a sweat bath of moisture. So we added Moisture Shield, a filter that provides two benefits. A thin scrim on the UltraFit 1000 driver screen, the filter material resists moisture that could get to the driver; the headphones keep performing through strenuous activity. Moisture Shield also provides an acoustic barrier to help smooth frequency response.
 5. SecureFit™ Support. You're ready for your workout. You put on your headphones and get to work. The last thing you want is for an earpiece to fall out, instantly breaking your rhythm. SecureFit Support includes an ergonomically designed flexible ear hook that wraps around your ear, so the headphone stays in place, even during strenuous exercise. With SecureFit Support, you'll experience a snug yet comfortable fit.
 6. StrainGuard™. UltraFit Sports Headphones have been designed with this in mind. Strainguard™ is a protective system that addresses the areas where sports headphones fail most often. A Kevlar core that houses the speaker wire provides extra tensile strength to prevent the wire from being pulled apart at common failure points - the transitions between cable and the connectors and at the headphones. In the UltraFit Series, all transitional connections are computer designed to strengthen the points where they fail most.
 7. Environmental Awareness. Being aware of your surroundings is always important when you use a pair of headphones. In the gym, on the track or walking through the neighborhood, you want to be able to have a sense of what's going on around you.
    
    

In the Box

 * Headphones
 * Protective Case
 * 14" Cable (35.6 cm)
 * 41" Cable (104.1 cm)
 * 3 Pairs StayFit™ Silicone Ear Tips (S/M/L)
 * Shirt Clip
 * Warranty: One Year Limited parts and labor

To setup and operate this product

Download the Quick Fit Guide

Download the Manual

Watch the Video

Technical Specifications

UltraFit 1000 Sensitivity 118db Impedance 16 ohms Aprox Weight 0.5oz (14gm) Frequency Response 18Hz-23Khz Style In Ear Bud Transducer Type Dynamic Balance® Transducer Diameter 14.2mm In Line Apple Remote Yes Built-in Microphone Yes Input Connections 3.5mm Finishes Black & Red, White & Grey Parts Warranty 1 Year Labor Warranty 1 Year Included Cables 11.4" Round, 14" Flat, 41" Flat Included Ear Tips 3 Pairs StayFit™ Silicone Ear Tips (S/M/L) Included Accessories Moisture Resistant Soft Case, Shirt Clip, Quick Start Guide and Manual 1To ensure a valid warranty, Polk loudspeakers must be purchased at an Authorized Polk Audio home or car loudspeaker Dealer such as Amazon.com. (If you're not sure a dealer is "authorized," call Polk Audio at 1-800-377-7655, and ask us.) The warranty is not transferrable, that means it applies only to the original purchaser. If you purchase your speakers from a private individual, that product is considered "used" and has NO factory warranty, no matter what the seller implies. The warranty is VOID if the serial number of the speaker has been removed or defaced. If you have any questions about your warranty coverage, or you think you need service, call Polk Customer Service at 1-800-377-7655. We're here to help you get the most from your new speakers!
feature_bullets: High Performance Digital Sound - Surprising detail and fidelity to maximize performance
3 Button Remote Control & Microphone - Use your iPhone and iPod on the fly with in-line controls.
SecureFit Support - Exercise or play knowing your headphones will stay comfortably in place.
Ultra Flexible Tangled-Free Planar Audio Cables - Avoid cable tangle and unwanted microphonics with oxygen-free cables in two custom lengths.
StrainGuard - Kevlar core and computer designed transitional connections eliminate cable failure
